isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - Before 12/06/1994 - MAINTENANCE - AIR FILTER

svcproc.title: AIR FILTER
svcproc.para: The air conditioning system air filter element should be replaced every year at the beginning of the cooling season. More frequent replacement may be required on some vehicles.

step1.para: Remove the covers from the passenger side of the instrument panel and the Blend-Air unit.
Remove the seal mounting strip with seal from the blower housing ( Figure 11).
Remove the old element and place the new filter into the slot between the blower housing and the evaporator.

note.para: If the direction of air flow is not indicated on the filter, the mesh side of the filter faces toward the evaporator.

step1.para: Inspect the seal and replace if damaged. Attach the new seal to the mounting strip with weatherstrip adhesive.
Install the seal mounting strip with seal on the blower housing.
Replace the covers on the Blend-Air unit and the instrument panel.
